name: Classic Block Crush
description:
This is a classic yet innovative game! you will love Classic Blocks Crush game!
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.

# Features of Classic Blocks Crush


- Simple rules and Easy control.
- Leader-board support.
- Smooth and delicate animation.
- Hours of fun, exciting play.
- Support both Phones and Tablets.
- FREE Update!.


# How to play Classic Blocks Crush :

- Use the controls at bottom to control blocks movement
- Try to fit them with a goal to cover all the space.
- When a complete line is created without space the points are added & the line vanishes !!!.
- Use the down arrow button to speed up the falling speed of blocks.
- Use the rotate button to change the blocks angle .
- Try to create as many points as you can & get your name to the top of leaderboard.

We would love to get user opinions on Classic Blocks Crush
Any recommendation on Classic Blocks Crush will be considered for in the next update….
